column1: Omidiyeh (Persian: اميديه‎; also Romanized as Omīdīyeh) is a city and capital of Omidiyeh County
Omidiyeh has a desert climate (Köppen climate classification BWh) with long
column3: short winters. Omidiyeh is consistently one of the hottest places on the planet during the summer
column4: with summer temperatures regularly at least 45 degrees Celsius
column5: sometimes exceeding 50 degrees Celsius with many sandstorms and duststorms common during the summer period. However
column7: the minimum temperature can fall to around +5 degrees Celsius. Winters in Omidiyeh have no snow. The average annual rainfall is around 255 mm.
